summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented for /emi-calculator: the page H1/title remains "Free EMI Calculator Online", an intro paragraph was added via ToolShell description, and SEO utility now sets exact requested title/meta description for /emi-calculator. However, the diff also introduces SEO metadata for additional routes beyond /emi-calculator, which conflicts with the acceptance criterion that no other routes’ titles/descriptions change and with the non-goal of updating SEO content for other pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Added page-specific SEO title/meta description mappings for routes other than /emi-calculator (e.g., /age-calculator, /sip-calculator, /image-compressor, /jpg-to-pdf).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits SEO updates to /emi-calculator and states no other routes’ titles/descriptions should change; adding metadata for other routes is outside scope and may change their document titles/descriptions.
